properties.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Custer; Loup; Brown; Blaine
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 12 at 3:04PM CST until February 13 at 10:00AM CST by NWS North Platte NE
properties.description:
...POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS WIND CHILLS TONIGHT AND THURSDAY MORNING...

.North winds will combine with bitterly cold air, producing wind
chills as low as 29 below zero across north central Nebraska.

* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25
below zero.

* WHERE...Eastern Cherry, Brown, Blaine, Loup and Custer
Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 10 AM CST /9
AM MST/ Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ THURSDAY
